sentences.en: Any article that was not the real thing was called bogus.
sentences.cn: 任何不是真品的东西都叫做冒牌货.

sentences.en: As with the bogus country gentlemen , it was becoming a little of an act.
sentences.cn: 这也和那些假乡绅一样,多少成了一种姿态.

sentences.en: bogus claims of injury by workers
sentences.cn: 工人们虚报受伤情况索赔

sentences.en: Everything else was bogus, only money was genuine.
sentences.cn: 什么也是假的, 只有钱是真的.

sentences.en: He made up some bogus data in his report and got expelled.
sentences.cn: 他使出虚构造假的数字在他的报告中结果被退学了.

sentences.en: He said these figures were bogus and totally inaccurate.
sentences.cn: 他说这些数字都是捏造的，完全不准确。

sentences.en: Police have been hampered by Mr Urquhart's use of bogus names.
sentences.cn: 厄克特先生使用了假名，警方的调查因此受阻。

sentences.en: She was fooled by his bogus identity card.
sentences.cn: 她被他的假身份证骗了.

sentences.en: She went out to make a " meet " to buy more bogus bills.
sentences.cn: 她出去 “ 找人 ”,想多买点伪钞.

sentences.en: The crooks discovered the plant and fed him bogus information.
sentences.cn: 窃贼发现了打入内部的警探,向他提供假情报.

sentences.en: The police quickly found the distributors of the bogus twenty - dollar bills.
sentences.cn: 警察很快就找到了那些散发二十元票面伪币的家伙.

sentences.en: The telegram turned out to have been bogus.
There are more bogus jobs than there are real jobs.
sentences.cn: 无事忙的工作超过真正的工作.

sentences.en: They must not be lade led into making bogus investments.
sentences.cn: 他们绝对不能被诱导而做出虚假的投资.

sentences.en: They must not be led into making bogus investments.
sentences.cn: 他们必须避免被诱导作出虚假的投资.

trans.tran_en: not true or real, although someone is trying to make you think it is
